level.heading: EXEMPTION FROM TAX OF CAPITAL GAINS ON QUALIFIED ASSETS (ยง 9-1109)

level.text: Qualified capital gain from the sale or exchange of QHTC assets held for more than five (5) years are excluded from the computation of District gross income.
The amount of qualified capital gain shall not include gain which:
Is attributable to real property or an intangible asset which is not an integral part of a QHTC; and
Occurs before January 1, 2001 or after December 31, 2007.
